author: Special Correspondent
text:
Abhinayashree (21), daughter of Santhalingam of Arisipalayam, near Madukkarai, was killed, while her sister Anusuya Devi (21) escaped with injuries, when the moped in which they were travelling met with an accident near their house on Wednesday evening. Both of them were studying in Government Arts College. The injured victim is undergoing treatment at Coimbatore Medical College Hospital.

In another accident, Rooban (31), of Arumuganeri in Thootukudi district, was crushed to death by an unidentified vehicle in a case of hit-and-run near Arasur on Avanashi Road on Wednesday night. Investigations are on.

House, clinic burgled

Burglars broke into the clinic of Dr. Shobana (40), wife of lawyer Ravichandran, on Mahatma Gandhi Road in Avarampalayam and decamped with Rs. 7,000.

In another incident, burglars broke into the house of Ramakrishnan (54), of Thirukumaran Nagar in Singanallur, and decamped with four sovereign gold jewellery and silver articles. The victim, who locked the house and went to Hyderabad noticed the burglary when he returned on Thursday.
title: Two killed, one injured in accidents
